documentation.text:
The WarpVaultLPFactory contract is designed to produce individual WarpVaultLP contracts
This contract uses the OpenZeppelin contract Library to inherit functions from
Ownable.sol*

The WarpVaultLPFactory contract is designed to produce individual WarpVaultLP contracts
This contract uses the OpenZeppelin contract Library to inherit functions from
Ownable.sol*

params._lp: is the address for the LP token this Warp Vault will manage
params._lpName: is the name of the LP token (ex:wETH-wBTC)*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createWarpVaultLP(address,string).notice: createWarpVaultLP allows the contract owner to create a new WarpVaultLP contract for a specific LP token

userdoc.notice: The WarpVaultLPFactory contract is designed to produce individual WarpVaultLP contracts This contract uses the OpenZeppelin contract Library to inherit functions from Ownable.sol*
